title: Baking unleavened bread: Pushtu Nomads
creator_credit: International Film Foundation, Julien Bryan and Hermann Schlenker
brief_description: Reveals the simple but physically demanding life of the nomadic Pushtu. Shows a Pushtu wife skilfully fashioning large flat discs of dough and baking each separately by pressing it into the convex side of a great copper pan. Suitable for Upper Primary-Middle Secondary students.
creator_credit_for_label: International Film Foundation, Julien Bryan and Hermann Schlenker
